name: SuperHover
description:
I grip my pistol tightly, wandering through this endless maze. "I can do this." I think to myself. "It's going to pay off soon, I know it will."

SuperHover is a top-down shooter roguelike game created for the PROCJAM 2020 free for Windows.

You take control of an unnamed person, who spotted the only working wishing well left on Earth. Nobody was brave enough to get there, except for you. There are many monsters and beasts guarding this tower, but you can get some upgrades by using some smaller wishing wells. There are 2 different endings to this game, can you find them both?

*this demo was released in an unfinished state*
